meta_info.name: ROLE
meta_info.description: Generic description of a role performed by an Actor. The role corresponds to a competency of the Party. Roles are used to define the responsibilities undertaken by a Party for a purpose. Roles should have credentials qualifying the performer to perform the role.

attributes.name: time_validity
attributes.description: Valid time interval for this role.

attributes.name: performer
attributes.description: Reference to Version container of Actor playing the role.
